aiReadiness.title: AI Readiness Assessment
aiReadiness.description: Evaluate your organization's readiness for AI adoption across four key dimensions and get personalized recommendations.
aiReadiness.heroDesc: A quick diagnostic to evaluate where your insurance organization stands on AI readiness — and what to do next.
aiReadiness.techQ1: Our organization has reliable, modern technology infrastructure (fast internet, current hardware, cloud access)
aiReadiness.techQ2: We have experience with software tools beyond basic office suites (policy management, claims systems, CRM platforms)
aiReadiness.techQ3: Our team is comfortable trying new digital tools and adapting to technology changes
aiReadiness.culturalQ1: Leadership actively supports exploring new technologies and innovations
aiReadiness.culturalQ2: There is openness among team members to changing established workflows
aiReadiness.culturalQ3: Our organization values continuous learning and professional development
aiReadiness.policyQ1: We have clear data privacy and confidentiality policies in place
aiReadiness.policyQ2: We have guidelines or policies for evaluating and adopting new technology
aiReadiness.policyQ3: We understand the regulatory obligations related to AI use in our jurisdiction
aiReadiness.skillsQ1: Team members have basic digital literacy (comfortable with search, online tools, file management)
aiReadiness.skillsQ2: At least some team members have experimented with AI tools (ChatGPT, Copilot, etc.)
aiReadiness.skillsQ3: We have capacity to dedicate time to learning and training on new tools
aiReadiness.strengthsDesc: These are the areas where your organization is best positioned:
aiReadiness.improvementsDesc: Focus your efforts here to accelerate AI readiness:
aiReadiness.nextStepsDesc: Based on your results, here are your recommended actions:
aiReadiness.recTechnical: Build your technical foundation. Start with our AI 101 guide to understand the technology landscape.
aiReadiness.recCultural: Foster a culture of innovation. Explore our guide on What to Do with AI for practical adoption strategies.
aiReadiness.recPolicy: Develop your AI governance framework. Review regulatory requirements and industry guidelines for AI in insurance.
aiReadiness.recSkills: Invest in skills development. Try our Quick Wins for hands-on practice and Prompt Engineering for deeper skills.
aiReadiness.ctaTitle: Ready to Take the Next Step?
aiReadiness.ctaDesc: Whether you're just starting or ready to integrate AI into your insurance practice, Insureversia has the resources to guide you.

learningProgram.title: AI in Insurance: The Learning Program
learningProgram.description: A hands-on, personalized learning program for insurance professionals who want to use AI competently and ethically.
learningProgram.heroLead: Hands-on, hyper-personalized, and built for your insurance sector. A structured learning program for insurance professionals who want to use AI competently and ethically.
learningProgram.problemTitle: The Problem with Generic AI Courses
learningProgram.problemP1: AI is transforming every area of insurance. But most courses teach generic skills to generic audiences. They don't account for your insurance sector, your experience level, or how you actually learn best.
learningProgram.problemP2: You don't need another webinar. You need a structured, hands-on program designed for the way you work — one that starts with understanding who you are as a professional and a learner.
learningProgram.pillar1Desc: Every program starts with a scientific assessment of your role, goals, and learning style. No two programs are the same.
learningProgram.pillar2Desc: Case studies, role simulations, real-world scenarios. Text, audio, and video formats. You learn by doing, not by watching.
learningProgram.pillar3Desc: Built on active learning, critical thinking, and experiential learning principles. Six task types across nine progressive levels.
learningProgram.formatsSubtitle: 18 formats across 5 categories. From a one-hour talk to a multi-week bootcamp — choose the depth that fits your needs.
learningProgram.formatBriefDesc: Quick, high-impact sessions for teams and events.
learningProgram.formatFocusedDesc: Deeper dives into specific topics with hands-on practice.
learningProgram.formatIntensiveDesc: Immersive, high-intensity programs for rapid transformation.
learningProgram.formatSpecializedDesc: Ongoing, tailored support for individuals and teams.
learningProgram.formatSpecializedFormats: Labs, Coaching, Training Sessions, Progressive Development
learningProgram.mode1Desc: Study at your own pace with structured materials, exercises, and self-assessments.
learningProgram.mode2Desc: Guided learning with expert feedback, check-ins, and personalized support.
learningProgram.mode3Desc: Face-to-face or live sessions with direct mentoring and real-time interaction.
learningProgram.step1Desc: Complete the AI Readiness Assessment to understand your starting point.
learningProgram.step2Desc: We analyze your profile and design a program tailored to your needs.
learningProgram.step3Desc: Pick the format, duration, and learning mode that works for you.
learningProgram.step4Desc: Begin your hands-on journey with structured content and expert support.
learningProgram.methodologyDesc: The Smoother methodology is grounded in active learning, critical thinking, and experiential education. Every program uses six task types — Exploration, Interpretation, Critical Analysis, Application, Evaluation, and Metacognition — designed to build progressively deeper competence across nine levels.
